channel.title: erm...Server help
channel.description:
Hello dudes/dudets, Bonjour, Ola, Konichiwa, ermm... Oh k. I have a Windows Xp comp. I am trying to created a Server... All thanks to the people of moparscape and this awesome forum!!!! :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D. so ok...erm The source I am using is fine. I just want to update the server. U know. Get some new weapons like a whip, gs, some new Armour like bandos, 3rd age, some new items, and some new npc's, and good upgrades. on the server. How am I going to do that. I heard of [508]'s but everytime i try to use the server it says this in cmd...
XCEPTION IN THREAD "MAIN" JAVA.LANG.NOCLASSDEFFOUNDERROR: palidino 76/rs2/server
press any key to continue... I really don't get it... And i am trying a client and this is what it says in cmd the same darn thing...
I really need help though. Just on my first question. Well maybe all of them...
And if ur really genorus maybe u can tell me step by step of how to do fix everything... tyvm
THIS IS MY FIRST POST!!!! ;D :| :P :eek: :cool: :rolleyes: ;) :)... pLZ TELL ME IF I VIOLATED A RULE OR SOMETHING.
mOPARSCAPE RULZ!!!!!
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 17, 2009, 05:25:56 pm[/size][hr]ALSO,,,, I am using Blazescape hd source. And a hd client... :|
Cyaz.
MOPARSCAPE RULZ! :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 17, 2009, 05:51:02 pm[/size][hr]And how do i use no-ip without using hamachi![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2009, 06:51:54 am[/size][hr]plz somone!!! I need serious help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2009, 02:17:35 pm[/size][hr]Thats it topic closed...

item.title: erm...Server help
item.dc:creator: @whymeman whymeman
item.description:
@whymeman wrote:

Hello dudes/dudets, Bonjour, Ola, Konichiwa, ermm…
Oh k. I have a Windows Xp comp. I am trying to created a Server… All thanks to the people of moparscape and this awesome forum!!! :D. so ok…erm
The source I am using is fine. I just want to update the server. U know. Get some new weapons like a whip, gs, some new Armour like bandos, 3rd age, some new items, and some new npc’s, and good upgrades. on the server.
How am I going to do that. I heard of [508]'s but everytime i try to use the server it says this in cmd…

XCEPTION IN THREAD “MAIN” JAVA.LANG.NOCLASSDEFFOUNDERROR: palidino 76/rs2/server

press any key to continue…
I really don’t get it…
And i am trying a client and this is what it says in cmd the same darn thing…

I really need help though. Just on my first question. Well maybe all of them…

And if ur really genorus maybe u can tell me step by step of how to do fix everything…
tyvm

THIS IS MY FIRST POST!!! ;D :eek: :rolleyes: :)… pLZ TELL ME IF I VIOLATED A RULE OR SOMETHING.

mOPARSCAPE RULZ!!!
